overview: American Dexter travels to Turkey on behalf of a US client in order to put an end to the drug gang leader Ismail. Dexter brings the beautiful blonde Janet as an erotic bait. Ismail shows great interest in Janet, but Dexter suspects he has been double crossed by his American client.

production_companies.name: Ernst Ritter von Theumer Film- und Fernsehproduktion

title: There's Still Room in Hell
